name: Elder Care Story
description: Story about elderly person needing care
transcript: Hi there, this is Patricia Miller. I'm 78 years old and I live alone in Portland, Oregon. My children live far away and can't help me much. I'm having trouble with my mobility and I need assistance with daily activities like grocery shopping and getting to doctor appointments. I also need help paying for my prescription medications - they're very expensive on my fixed income. I'm worried about falling and not being able to get help. I need home care services and maybe some medical alert equipment. You can reach me at patricia.miller.elder@email.com. I appreciate any help you can provide. Thank you.

segments.text: Hi there, this is Patricia Miller.
I'm 78 years old and I live alone in Portland, Oregon.
My children live far away and can't help me much.
I'm having trouble with my mobility and I need assistance with daily activities like grocery shopping and getting to doctor appointments.
I also need help paying for my prescription medications - they're very expensive on my fixed income.
I'm worried about falling and not being able to get help.
I need home care services and maybe some medical alert equipment.
You can reach me at patricia.miller.elder@email.com.
I appreciate any help you can provide.
